title: [Gyldemar Forest, Crumbling Road]
description: The paving stones are so widely spaced that the causeway is almost nonexistent, only the youth of the trees to the northwest revealing where the roadbed once lay.  Creepers as thick as a troll's wrist and almost as warty hang from the branches of some of the older trees.

The paving stones are so widely spaced that the causeway is almost nonexistent, only the youth of the trees to the northwest revealing where the roadbed once lay.  Creepers as thick as a troll's wrist and almost as warty hang from the branches of some of the older trees like ghostly hands in the darkness.
